entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 03 - Statement of financial position includes the concept jadranskinaftovod:KRATKOROCNEOBVEZE in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called jadranskinaftovod:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ConsolidatedAndSeparateFinancialStatementsAxis. The statement presentation group 03 - Statement of financial position includes a presentation concept called jadranskinaftovod:KRATKOROCNEOBVEZE. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table jadranskinaftovod:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable:
jadranskinaftovod:KRATKOROCNEOBVEZE = 127,947,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table jadranskinaftovod:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept KRATKOROCNEOBVEZE is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : jadranskinaftovod:KRATKOROCNEOBVEZE Total period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://jadranskinaftovod.com/xbrl/2021/jadranskinaftovod-2021-12-31.xsd 68

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 905,498,000 reported in the network role http://jadranskinaftovod.com/xbrl/2021/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 780,793,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://jadranskinaftovod.com/xbrl/2021/roles/IzvjesceOPromjenamaKapitala. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : HRK Decimals of OtherReserves : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7478000060PHVTZCWI98/2021-12-31/ESEF/HR/0/jadranskinaftovod-2021-12-31-hr.zip/jadranskinaftovod-2021-12-31-hr/reports/jadranskinaftovod-2021-12-31-hr.xhtml 4602
